settingsDiv.appendChild(settingsUl); settings.map((setting) => { let settingLi = document.createElement("li"); settingLi.setAttribute("class", "nav-setting-li"); if (setting.onclick) { settingLi.onclick = setting.onclick; } settingLi.innerHTML = setting.url; settingsUl.appendChild(settingLi); }); openSettingsContainerDiv.appendChild(settingsDiv); checkWidthToAppend(992, navbarHeader, desktopNavbar, openSettingsContainerDiv); openSettingsContainerDiv.addEventListener("mouseout", mouseOut); } else { accountContainerDiv.removeEventListener("mouseover", mouseOver); accountContainerDiv.removeEventListener("mouseout", mouseOut); let open = false; openSettingsContainerDiv.style.height = "0"; settingsDiv.style.display = "none"; accountContainerDiv.addEventListener("click", () => { if (!open) { open = !open; openSettingsContainerDiv.style.height = "80px"; settingsDiv.style.display = "block"; } else { open = !open; openSettingsContainerDiv.style.height = "0"; settingsDiv.style.display = "none"; } }); } window.addEventListener("resize", function () { var width = window.innerWidth;
